mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SECURE_DATA_VERSION ( ID, SDBOX_ID, PATH, ENCRYPTED_BLOB, `TYPE`, SIZE_IN_BYTES, ACTION, VERSION_CREATED_BY, VERSION_CREATED_TS, ACTION_PRINCIPAL, ACTION_TS ) VALUES ( #{record.id}, #{record.sdboxId}, #{record.path}, #{record.encryptedBlob}, #{record.type}, #{record.sizeInBytes}, #{record.action}, #{record.versionCreatedBy}, #{record.versionCreatedTs}, #{record.actionPrincipal}, #{record.actionTs} )
mapper.update: UPDATE SECURE_DATA_VERSION SET ENCRYPTED_BLOB = #{record.encryptedBlob}, LAST_ROTATED_TS = #{record.lastRotatedTs} WHERE ID = #{record.id}
mapper.select: SELECT ID, SDBOX_ID, PATH, ENCRYPTED_BLOB, `TYPE`, SIZE_IN_BYTES, CREATED_BY, CREATED_TS, LAST_UPDATED_BY, LAST_UPDATED_TS From SECURE_DATA WHERE PATH = #{path}
SELECT COUNT(ID) FROM SECURE_DATA_VERSION WHERE PATH = #{path}

SELECT ID, SDBOX_ID, PATH, ENCRYPTED_BLOB, `TYPE`, SIZE_IN_BYTES, ACTION, VERSION_CREATED_BY, VERSION_CREATED_TS, ACTION_PRINCIPAL, ACTION_TS, LAST_ROTATED_TS From SECURE_DATA_VERSION WHERE PATH = #{path} ORDER BY ACTION_TS DESC LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset}

SELECT ID, SDBOX_ID, PATH, ACTION, ENCRYPTED_BLOB, `TYPE`, SIZE_IN_BYTES, VERSION_CREATED_BY, VERSION_CREATED_TS, ACTION_PRINCIPAL, ACTION_TS, LAST_ROTATED_TS From SECURE_DATA_VERSION WHERE ID = #{id}

SELECT ID, SDBOX_ID, PATH, ACTION, ENCRYPTED_BLOB, `TYPE`, SIZE_IN_BYTES, VERSION_CREATED_BY, VERSION_CREATED_TS, ACTION_PRINCIPAL, ACTION_TS, LAST_ROTATED_TS From SECURE_DATA_VERSION WHERE ID = #{id} FOR UPDATE
SELECT DISTINCT PATH From SECURE_DATA_VERSION WHERE PATH LIKE '${partialPath}%';
SELECT DISTINCT PATH From SECURE_DATA_VERSION WHERE SDBOX_ID = #{sdbId};
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM SECURE_DATA_VERSION WHERE PATH LIKE '${partialPath}%';
